LastModificationTime.description: The time the signal catalog was last updated in seconds since epoch (January 1, 1970 at midnight UTC time).

NodeCounts.TotalNodes.description: The total number of nodes in a vehicle network.

NodeCounts.TotalSensors.description: The total number of nodes in a vehicle network that represent sensors.

NodeCounts.TotalAttributes.description: The total number of nodes in a vehicle network that represent attributes.

NodeCounts.TotalBranches.description: The total number of nodes in a vehicle network that represent branches.

NodeCounts.TotalActuators.description: The total number of nodes in a vehicle network that represent actuators.

CreationTime.description: The time the signal catalog was created in seconds since epoch (January 1, 1970 at midnight UTC time).

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the signal catalog.

AllowedValues.description: A list of possible values an actuator can take.

AssignedValue.description: A specified value for the actuator.

DataType.description: The specified data type of the actuator.

Description.description: A brief description of the actuator.

FullyQualifiedName.description: The fully qualified name of the actuator. For example, the fully qualified name of an actuator might be `Vehicle.Front.Left.Door.Lock` .

Max.description: The specified possible maximum value of an actuator.

Min.description: The specified possible minimum value of an actuator.

Unit.description: The scientific unit for the actuator.

Actuator.description:
A signal that represents a vehicle device such as the engine, heater, and door locks. Data from an actuator reports the state of a certain vehicle device.

> Updating actuator data can change the state of a device. For example, you can turn on or off the heater by updating its actuator data.

AllowedValues.description: A list of possible values an attribute can be assigned.

AssignedValue.description: A specified value for the attribute.

DataType.description: The specified data type of the attribute.

DefaultValue.description: The default value of the attribute.

Description.description: A brief description of the attribute.

FullyQualifiedName.description: The fully qualified name of the attribute. For example, the fully qualified name of an attribute might be `Vehicle.Body.Engine.Type` .

Max.description: The specified possible maximum value of the attribute.

Min.description: The specified possible minimum value of the attribute.

Unit.description: The scientific unit for the attribute.

Attribute.description: A signal that represents static information about the vehicle, such as engine type or manufacturing date.

Description.description: A brief description of the branch.

FullyQualifiedName.description: The fully qualified name of the branch. For example, the fully qualified name of a branch might be `Vehicle.Body.Engine` .

Branch.description: A group of signals that are defined in a hierarchical structure.

Node.description: A general abstraction of a signal. A node can be specified as an actuator, attribute, branch, or sensor.

TotalActuators.description: The total number of nodes in a vehicle network that represent actuators.

TotalAttributes.description: The total number of nodes in a vehicle network that represent attributes.

TotalBranches.description: The total number of nodes in a vehicle network that represent branches.

TotalNodes.description: The total number of nodes in a vehicle network.

TotalSensors.description: The total number of nodes in a vehicle network that represent sensors.

NodeCounts.description: Information about the number of nodes and node types in a vehicle network.

AllowedValues.description: A list of possible values a sensor can take.

DataType.description: The specified data type of the sensor.

Description.description: A brief description of a sensor.

FullyQualifiedName.description: The fully qualified name of the sensor. For example, the fully qualified name of a sensor might be `Vehicle.Body.Engine.Battery` .

Max.description: The specified possible maximum value of the sensor.

Min.description: The specified possible minimum value of the sensor.

Unit.description: The scientific unit of measurement for data collected by the sensor.

Sensor.description:
An input component that reports the environmental condition of a vehicle.

> You can collect data about fluid levels, temperatures, vibrations, or battery voltage from sensors.

description:
Creates a collection of standardized signals that can be reused to create vehicle models.

For more information, see [Signal catalogs](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/iot-fleetwise/latest/developerguide/signal-catalogs.html) in the *AWS IoT FleetWise Developer Guide* .

Description.description: A brief description of the signal catalog.

Name.description: The name of the signal catalog.

NodeCounts.description: Information about the number of nodes and node types in a vehicle network.

Nodes.description: A list of information about nodes, which are a general abstraction of signals.

Tags.description: Metadata that can be used to manage the signal catalog.
